Hi Michael, 
Here is a resource on risk management that discusses worker safety that may be of use to you as you create your own worker safety program. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/107224
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org
